document.full_text: shawn hunwick stopped 40 shots as the wolverines surprised the top-seeded sioux to advance to the n.c.a.a. title game against minnesota-duluth, which edged notre dame.
document.title: frozen four: michigan stifles no. 1 north dakota
lines_and_colors: shawn hunwick stopped 40 shots as the wolverines surprised the top-seeded sioux to advance to the n.c.a.a. title game against minnesota-duluth, which edged notre dame.
